description: This file is a shell script used for finding files in sysroot that are not tracked by the sstate manifest in a build environment, specifically for OpenEmbedded/Yocto build system. It processes directories, applies whitelists, compares sysroot contents, and reports untracked files.
external_files: <standard utilities: cat, sed, grep, find, wc, date, xargs>

methods.name: usage
methods.description: Displays help message explaining script usage and options.

methods.name: echo_error
methods.description: Prints error message to stderr and exits with code 1.
